name: fluidtypo3/fluidcontent_core
description: Replace css_styled_content with your own templates

suggest.fluidtypo3/fluidcontent: Gives the ability to render Content Templates with pure fluid.
suggest.fluidtypo3/fluidpages: Gives the ability to render Page Templates with pure fluid.
suggest.fluidbt/fluidbootstraptheme: Provides Twitter Bootstrap templates for fluidcontent and fluidpages
